Body.Content:
We are announcing Agents in Plan Designer for Power Apps Studio. This feature will allow Plan Designer to generate Autonomous Agents as part of a maker's end-to-end business solution. Autonomous Agents will help streamline business operations by eliminating repetitive tasks, allowing employees to better focus on impactful work. This feature will reach general availability on May 22, 2025.

How does this affect me?
As part of your solution, Plan Designer will now be able to propose an Autonomous Agent to operate on your behalf. This agent will be prefilled with a name, description, generated instructions, and knowledge from the plan. Makers are encouraged to add triggers and actions to their Agents and to test them prior to publishing.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Apps Studio â€“ Introducing Agents in Plan Designer
